select id,operating_content, operating_people_id, operating_people, project_id, form_id, form_type, gmt_create, gmt_modify from test_project_record where 1 = 1
and project_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and operating_people like CONCAT(CONCAT(#{operatingPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and form_type like CONCAT(CONCAT(#{formType,jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
order by gmt_create DESC
